trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>.
Typical queries that can be made are as follows:
Current state of the state machine.
Possible transitions from the current state.
History of transitions for the state machine instance.
Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref> class.
The current workflow runtime.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
runtime is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
or
instanceId is an empty .
Gets the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
Gets the name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The name of the workflow queue.
The object to queue.
Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The name of the workflow queue.
The object to queue.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
Gets the <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
A collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
targetStateName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The specified by targetStateName is a null reference (`Nothing`).
Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
targetState is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
A collection of transitions that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> has made.
Gets the latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
The latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
If the workflow has already completed, the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow"></xref>.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
